NFTs

  • Set up your wallet

    Once you’ve set up your wallet of choice, connect it to OpenSea by clicking the wallet icon in the top right corner.

  • List them for sale

    Once you’ve set up your wallet of choice, connect it to OpenSea by clicking the wallet icon in the top right corner.
